config-path.name: config-path
config-path.description: Override the default location to look for a config.yml file

diff.description: Print a diff of DevCycle variable usage between two versions of your code.

config-path.name: config-path
config-path.description: Override the default location to look for a config.yml file

file.name: file
file.description: File path of existing diff file to inspect.

client-name.name: client-name
client-name.description: Name(s) of the DevCycle client variable to match on. Accepts multiple values.

match-pattern.name: match-pattern
match-pattern.description: Additional full Regex pattern to use to match variable usages in your code. Should contain exactly one capture group which matches on the key of the variable. Must specify the file extension to override the pattern for, eg. "--match-pattern js=<YOUR PATTERN>"

args.name: diff-pattern
args.description: A "git diff"-compatible diff pattern, eg. "branch1 branch2"
